mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flight (id, number, departure_airport, arrival_airport, aircraft, scheduled_departure, scheduled_arrival, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{model.flightID}, #{model.number}, #{model.departureAirport}, #{model.arrivalAirport} #{model.aircraft}, #{model.scheduledDeparture}, #{model.scheduledArrival}, #{model.status}, #{model.createdAt}, #{model.updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, number, departure_airport, arrival_airport, aircraft, scheduled_departure, scheduled_arrival, actual_departure, actual_arrival, status, created_at, updated_at FROM flight WHERE id = #{id}
